name: Switcher (itch)
description:
You can play Switcher Post-Compo Version here

Beneath the surface of a girl, a dormant beast exists. She has super human abilities and is extremely dangerous. She is an enemy of the State.

v 1.0.0

First complete and playable version!

Created for LudumDare 29 by EhTd

From: http://ernesto.io

Use UP/DOWN for MOVEMENT

Use Z for ACTION

Beast will Punch

Girl will get Extra run boost
